title: Like Boris Johnson, Leo Varadkar needs Brexit done by October 31 so he can win an election
text:
The Irish government will go to every length to ensure that a Brexit deal is agreed this week or at least as soon as possible. Boris Johnson isn’t the only person looking to 'get Brexit done'.

Despite accusations from some Brexiteers that Dublin is intent on sabotaging the UK’s exit from the EU, the reality is quite the opposite. That is not to say that the Irish government doesn’t regret Britain’s decision to depart the bloc. It does for a number of reasons, not least that the two countries shared a similar outlook to European integration and London acted as a very effective bulwark against federalist impulses among some member states.

The Irish government’s main priority since the immediate...
description: The Irish government will go to every length to ensure that a Brexit deal is agreed this week or at least as soon as possible.
